item.title: Vicki add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: "Breathing in, I calm body and mind. Breathing out, I smile. Dwelling in the present moment I know this is the only moment." -- Thich Nhat Hanh

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Theodore Isaac Rubin
item.description: "I must learn to love the fool in me--the one who feels too much, talks too much, takes too many chances, wins sometimes and loses often, lacks self-control, loves and hates, hurts and gets hurt, promises and breaks promises, laughs and cries. It alone protects me against that utterly self-controlled, masterful tyrant whom I also harbor and who would rob me of my human aliveness, humility, and dignity but for my Fool." -- Theodore Isaac Rubin

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Don Miguel Ruiz
item.description: "Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourslef or to gossip about others. Use your power of your word in the direction of truth and love." -- Don Miguel Ruiz

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Vicki add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything." -- Plato

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "If I knew that today would be the last time I’d see you, I would hug you tight and pray the Lord be the keeper of your soul. If I knew that this would be the last time you pass through this door, I’d embrace you, kiss you, and call you back for one more. If I knew that this would be the last time I would hear your voice, I’d take hold of each word to be able to hear it over and over again. If I knew this is the last time I see you, I’d tell you I love you, and would not just assume foolishly you know it already." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Vicki add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this." -- Henry David Thoreau
